BlackStorm::

BlackStorm reacted with fear, it seemed that her spark was specting 
something awful, slowly her spark started to calm down but still was 
awared


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade nods and takes a seat in front of Blackstorm.
> 
> AzureBlade: Yggdrasil, I'll contact her spark. Be prepared to 
welcome 
> her... if I can convince her.
> 
> He slowly enters into a trance and sends warm emission at 
> Nightlight's spark. He waits for a reaction before beginning to 
talk.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackStorm:
> > 
> > BlackStorm remains un councious on the lab table. The program 
was
